content.heroIntro: Welcome to EDIFICIO NEPTUNO II, a stunning new development by COSTA BLANCA BOLU3 located in the heart of Centro, Torrevieja. Each unit spans 69m² of carefully designed living space, perfect for investors and lifestyle buyers seeking the best of Mediterranean coastal living. With delivery scheduled for January 1, 2027, EDIFICIO NEPTUNO II represents an exceptional opportunity in one of Spain's most vibrant expat communities. COSTA BLANCA BOLU3 has established a reputation for quality construction and attention to detail, ensuring each property meets the highest standards. The development's strategic Centro location places you within minutes of Playa del Cura (Blue Flag beach), world-class golf courses, excellent healthcare facilities, and a thriving international community. Whether you're seeking a vacation retreat, investment property with strong rental yields of €650 per week, or a permanent Mediterranean home, EDIFICIO NEPTUNO II delivers exceptional value at 45% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the dynamic heart of this thriving coastal city, known as Spain's largest expat community with English spoken everywhere. The neighbourhood perfectly balances authentic Spanish charm with modern international amenities, making it ideal for UK, Scandinavian, and European buyers. This vibrant district features tree-lined boulevards, contemporary shopping centres, and a cosmopolitan atmosphere while maintaining access to stunning golden beaches and natural salt lagoons. The area is home to Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja, one of the region's premier public healthcare facilities with 24-hour services, English-speaking staff, and world-class medical expertise. Just steps away, Playa del Cura offers crystal-clear waters and Blue Flag certification, while the renowned Villamartín Golf Club is only 15 minutes away. Centro's walkable streets connect you to independent boutiques, international restaurants, and the famous Torrevieja Marina with its vibrant nightlife and dining scene.
